system.description: The character's hatred for a specific foe burns with such intensity that their attacks carry devastating righteous fury.
system.benefit: When selecting talent, character chooses one group that they possess a Hatred Talent for. Against those of that group, character's attacks gain Vengeful (9), if character's attacks already possess this quality, decrease its value by 1.
system.notes: Choose one group you have Hatred for when taking this talent

specialAbilities.name: Vengeful (9)
specialAbilities.description: Against the chosen hated group, your attacks gain the Vengeful (9) quality. If your attacks already have this quality, decrease its value by 1.
